summary: MailChimp Integration enables synchronization between ChurchCRM contacts and your MailChimp email marketing lists.

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
To use MailChimp Integration, you need a MailChimp account and an API key.

1. Log in to your MailChimp account
2. Go to Account > Extras > API Keys
3. Create a new API key or copy an existing one
4. Enter the API key in the plugin settings

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- **Dashboard**: View all your MailChimp lists with subscriber statistics
- **List Maintenance**: Identify people in MailChimp but not in CRM, and vice versa
- **Contact Integration**: View MailChimp subscription status on Person and Family pages
- **Automatic Sync**: Hooks into person/family updates to keep MailChimp in sync

sections.title: Dashboard
sections.content:
Access the MailChimp Dashboard from the Email menu. The dashboard shows:

- Member count for each list
- Campaign statistics
- Unsubscribe counts
- List maintenance tools

sections.title: Person/Family Integration
sections.content:
When MailChimp is configured, a 'MailChimp' tab appears on Person view pages showing:

- Email subscription status across all lists
- Which lists the person is subscribed to
- Subscription statistics

sections.title: Privacy & Compliance
sections.content: This plugin transmits email addresses to MailChimp servers. Ensure you have appropriate consent from your members before syncing their information to third-party services like MailChimp.
